text:
="preserve">Moonlighting is a popular single about a young couple eloping to be married at Gretna Green, recorded by Leo Sayer.
Written by Sayer and Frank Farrell and co-produced by Adam Faith, "Moonlighting" made number 2 on the UK Singles Chart in September 1975. The song is on Sayer's album, "Another Year".
The New Zealand band Ardijah covered the song in 2002.
